EmailTemplate.name: Fulfillment Processed
EmailTemplate.subject: Your {!Fulfillment__c.Product_Name__c} has been processed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.ACDF_FName__c},
Your order ({!Fulfillment__c.Product_Name__c}) has been processed. As soon as your package has been shipped, you can track its progress using this tracking number: {!Fulfillment__c.Tracking__c}.
If you have any questions in the meantime, please contact your account manager or project coordinator.
Sincerely,
Five Star Professional
1-888-438-5782
info@fivestarprofessional.com
